banner.subtitle: Welcome to My Portfolio
banner.title: I'm Ahmed Al-Hussain
banner.description: I'm a front-end developer and web designer passionate about building beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites. I love turning ideas into interactive digital experiences that bring real value to users.

about.paragraph1: Hi! I'm Ahmed Al-Hussain, a full stack developer and web designer who enjoys creating modern, elegant, and responsive web interfaces. I focus on crafting clean and efficient code while delivering delightful user experiences.
about.paragraph2: I believe every project has a unique story to tell. My goal is to blend creativity and technology to transform ideas into meaningful digital products. <1>Let’s build something awesome together!</1>
about.paragraph3: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

lms.title: Learning Management System
lms.description: A comprehensive Learning Management System designed for online education. Includes course creation, user management, progress tracking, and interactive learning tools for instructors and students.

buildsmart.title: BuildSmart Company
buildsmart.description: I developed the front-end for BuildSmart, a company specialized in smart construction solutions. The goal was to build a clean, modern, and responsive interface that showcases their identity and services.

ecommerce.title: QuickCart E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: A complete single-seller e-commerce platform featuring product management, authentication, cart system, checkout flow, and responsive UI — built with modern technologies for a smooth shopping experience.

contact.subtitle: 04. What's Next?
contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I’m always open to new opportunities, collaborations, or even just a friendly chat. If you have a project or an idea you’d like to discuss, feel free to reach out — I’d love to hear from you!
